name: Super Auto Dude
description:
Built this game just to teach myself some Unity, all artwork is royalty free from the websites pexels.com, pixabay.com. I did some of the pixel artwork and the lovely ClownishJoe made the potion.

If I were to continue the project I would be adding unique artwork for all of the cards, character classes, character customization with a gold system. You would earn gold based on how well you did in the run. I would also balance the game a tad more and even possibly add more ability cards if I thought of more. Let me know your thoughts. This is my first game ever.

Thanks for trying the game out!

-BradsGaming
